body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, representative. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of Solomon W. Martin and Altezera Martin. Laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Livingston County, Kentucky, and Lyon County from 1862 to 1863.
